title: Video Title
description: Brief description of what the video teaches and what viewers will accomplish
category: Quick Start | Platform Overview | Troubleshooting | etc.
learningObjectives: Clear statement of what viewers will be able to do after completing this tutorial
estimatedTime: Estimated time to complete the tutorial (e.g., '15-20 minutes')

tutorialSteps.title: Step Title
tutorialSteps.content: Detailed instructions for this step, including what actions to take and what to expect as results.

tutorialSteps.title: Next Step Title
tutorialSteps.content: Clear instructions for the next action in the tutorial sequence.

tutorialSteps.title: Third Step Title
tutorialSteps.content: Continued step-by-step instructions that build upon previous steps.

tutorialSteps.title: Final Step Title
tutorialSteps.content: Instructions for completing the tutorial and next steps or recommendations.

learningResources.title: Related Documentation
learningResources.description: Supporting documentation that complements this tutorial

documentResources.title: Step-by-Step Checklist
documentResources.description: Downloadable checklist to follow along with the tutorial

documentResources.title: Sample Files
documentResources.description: Example files or templates used in the tutorial
